install.name: System - WebGuru's Google Analytics
install.author: Saruul.S
install.description: Thank you for installing the webguru google analytics plugin for Joomla! 1.5

param.name: ga_javascript
param.label: Paste your ENTIRE Google Analytics code into the text area:
param.description: Copy and paste the entire code from Google Analytics here

param.name: log_admin_area
param.label: Do not log admin area
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log the admin area, please check YES.

param.name: log_super_administrator
param.label: Do not log Super Administrators when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Super Administrators throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_administrator
param.label: Do not log Administrators when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Administrators throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_manager
param.label: Do not log Managers when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Managers throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_publisher
param.label: Do not log Publishers when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Publishers throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_editor
param.label: Do not log Editors when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Editors throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_author
param.label: Do not log Authors when logged in
param.description: If you DO NOT want to log Authors throughout your entire website when they are logged in, please check YES.

param.name: log_error_page
param.label: Log 404 errors as /error/error code/{url}?referrer={referrer}
param.description: If you want to log 404 error pages, please check YES.

param.name: log_search
param.label: Log searches as /search/{search}?referrer={referrer}
param.description: If you want to log searches on your website, please check YES.

param.name: log_outgoing_link
param.label: Log outgoing links as /outgoing/{url}?referrer={referrer}
param.description: If you want to log outgoing links from your website, please check YES
